sub_title: International Development, Humanitarian, Disaster Risk Reduction, Climate change adaptation and Global Health professional
summary: Humanitarian, global health, disaster management and international development professional with over 6 years of experience monitoring and evaluating programs, managing staff, training facilitation and implementing programs that support the mission of the development, humanitarianism, global health, and disaster management agencies. In addition to a master’s degree in International Disaster Management which has sharpened the above skills and broadened my understanding of climate change effects and policies to reduce vulnerability

- Oversaw the construction of 5000 shelters and latrines and ensure that every shelter has handwashing
